import React, { useState } from "react"; export function CreateUser(){ const [name, setName] = useState() const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [phone, setPhone] = useState() const [age, setAge] = useState() const [location, setLocation] = useState() const Submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:3001/createUser') .then(result => console.log(result)) .catch } return( <>

Add User

setName(e.target.value)}/>
setEmail(e.target.value)}/>
setPhone(e.target.value)}/>
setAge(e.target.value)}/>
setLocation(e.target.value)}/>
); }
